page.title: 05THE TELEPHONE EXCHANGE
page.content: In Ingoldsby we have our own Telephone Exchange. It is on the road from Ingoldsby to Humby.Ropsley Westby Bitchfield, Lenton, Keisby, Humby and Hanby all share our exchange. We have our post delivered by a post lady on her bike. She delivers to Ingoldsby,Lenton,Hanby and Great Humby and then back to Ingoldsby. When she goes on holiday the lady from the post office delivers the post in the car. There are two letter collections each day Monday to Friday and one on Saturday. All the mail goes into Grantham. There is one parcel collection each day.
